TopicTitle: Memory Leak, and Unutilized CPU and GPU power

Articles.Content:
Version: 0.1.0.0.20892

OS: Windows 11, version 10.0.22621

my pc specs: 16gb ram, nvidia gforce GTX 1660Ti, intel core i5-9400F CPU 2.90GHz

Bug description: the game freezes and the Memory usage jumps to 95-100% usage, ive waited for up to ten minutes but the only way out is closing the game through task manager. this happens most times i enter any loading screen

Performance issues: when i am able to launch something the game runs constantly at 10-15FPS, however my GPU is only being 30-60% utilized, and my CPU is only being used 50%

Steps to replicate: i dont know how to replicate this as it it always how it is for me

Fix: the only way i know to get around the memory issue is to make a new campaign. i have not been able to fix the performance issue
